alert.note: Alert for Castro; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 1:47PM CST until January 08 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph will cause some reduction to visibility due to blowing snow. * WHERE...The extreme southwestern Texas Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 8 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
